text: Viktor Grigoryevich Tsaryov (; 2 June 1931 - 2 January 2017) was a Russian footballer. He played professionally from 1954 to 1966. He was best known for playing as a midfielder for Dynamo Moscow. He later managed the USSR football team and Dynamo Moscow. He was born in Moscow. Tsaryov died on 2 January 2017 in Moscow at the age of 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Viktor Tsaryov at rusteam.permian.ru Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Footballers from Moscow Category:Soviet footballers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Viktor Tsaryov
